headline: Has Chubb’s Strong 2025 Share Price Runway Already Been Priced Into Its Valuation?
summary: Wondering if Chubb is still a smart buy at today’s price, or if most of the upside has already been captured? Let us unpack what the market might be pricing in and where the value debate really sits. Chubb’s share price has climbed to around $312.61, with gains of 5.2% over the last week, 5.8% over the last month, and a solid 14.7% year to date, building on 14.9% over 1 year, 54.0% over 3 years, and 122.5% over 5 years. Behind those moves, investors have been reacting to a mix of macro and...

headline: Here Are Tuesday’s Top Wall Street Analyst Research Calls: Allstate, Chubb Ltd., Eli Lilly, KLA Corp., Lockheed Martin, MongoDB, Roku, and More
summary: Pre-Market Stock Futures: The futures are trading lower after what started as a bounce-back Monday turned into a reversal Monday, as the AI/Datacenter rotation trade continues to gather steam during the last whole trading week of 2025. Stocks rallied Monday on the open as traders tried to inject some holiday spirit, but by 12 noon ...
